service.title: Link Relationship Types for Authentication
service.documentation: This specification defines a set of relationships that may be used to indicate where a user may authenticate, log out, register a new account or find out who is currently authenticated.

link-relation.documentation: The "authenticate" can be used to link to a resource that hosts a page where a user can authenticate itself for the current resource.
The "authenticated-as" link refers to a resource that describes the effective authenticated user for a HTTP response.
The "logout" refers to a resource where an authenticated user might end their session.
The "register-user" Link Relation refers to a resource where a user might sign up for a service for the context URI.
